string-array.name: moti
string-array.item: Dreams is not what you see in sleep is the thing which doesn\'t let you sleep
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn\'t work hard.
Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
Do not give up the beginning is always the hardest.
Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse
Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
"I haven\'t failed. I\'ve just found 10,000 ways that won\'t work.
If you genuinely want something, don\’t wait for it. Teach yourself to be impatient." — Gurbaksh Chahal
Dream big and dare to fail
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs
Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless
Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
I failed in some subjects in exam, but my friend passed in all. Now he is an engineer in Microsoft and I am the owner of Microsoft
You have to learn the rules of the game and then you have to play better than anyone else.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Dream big, work hard.
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
Be a hero, always say, I have no fear.
You\'re already a successful person the things we take for granted someone else is praying for.
If you can dream it. You can do it
Everyday is a second change
Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room
Life is like riding a bicycle to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
I will always choose a lazy person to do a difficult job because, he will find an easy way to do it.
Enjoy the game and chase your dreams. Dreams do come true
Don\'t waste your time with explanations. People only hear what they want to hear
Do not pray for an easy life. pray for the strength to endure a difficult one
I hated every minute of training. But I said, don\'t quit. Suffer now and love the rest of your life as a champion.
First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Life isn\’t about getting and having, it\’s about giving and being.
Life is what happens to you while you\’re busy making other plans
We become what we think about.
The mind is everything. What you think you become
Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
The best revenge is massive success
Opportunities don\’t happen. You create them
An unexamined life is not worth living
Eighty percent of success is showing up.
I\'m not a product of my circumstances. I\'m a product of my decisions
Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
